name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Third Division Armament Expansion
summary:
The Third Division Armament Expansion Kit contains a set of additional Trooper Cards to boost your ranks and help you in battle. This pack of 8 Legendary Troopers and 15 Epic Troopers includes, among others, "Yakuza: Like a Dragon" Ichiban Kasuga and Omelette.

In addition to the Trooper Cards, consumable items to level up your troops and high value goods are included.
